mapper.select:
select ar.areaName,ar.areaId,dru.rugstoreId,dru.drugstoreName,dru.drugstorenum,dru.produceDate,dru.validDate,dru.tradePrice,dru.unit,un.unitId,un.unitName,supp.supplierId,supp.supplierName,sku.skullId,sku.skullName,dru.type,ty.typeName,ty.typeId,dru.batch,dru.sellingPrice, war.warehouseId,war.supplierName as warehouseName from drugstore as dru left join upplier as supp on(supp.supplierId=dru.supplierId) left join unit as un on(un.unitId=dru.unit) left join skull as sku on(sku.skullId=dru.skullId) left join warehuose as war on(war.warehouseId=dru.warehouseId) left join area as ar on(ar.areaId=dru.area) left join type as ty on(dru.type=ty.typeId) where 1=1
and dru.validDate<now()
and dru.drugstorenum<=30
and dru.drugstoreName like '%${drugstoreName}%'
limit ${(page-1)*limit},${limit}
